Uses of Class
com.jaunt.JNode

  • Packages that use JNode 
    Package Description
    com.jaunt
    Jaunt 1.0 [website] is a web-scraping & automation package that exposes a lighweight HTTP useragent (headless browser).

    • Uses of JNode in com.jaunt

      Subclasses of JNode in com.jaunt 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  JNodes
      A List-like container of JNodes (JSON Nodes), used to represent a JSON array.
      Fields in com.jaunt declared as JNode 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      JNode UserAgent.json
      The JSON object created as a result of the most recent request, where response type was JSON.
      Methods in com.jaunt that return JNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JNode JNode.findFirst(String query)
      Searches descendant nodes and retrieves the first JNode that matches the specified query, or throws a NotFound Exception if no matching JNode is found; throws a NotFound Exception if no matching JNode is found, or if this method is invoked on a leaf node.
      JNode JNodes.get(int index)
      Returns the JNode at the specified position or throws a NotFound Exception if the specified position is out of bounds.
      JNode HandlerForJson.getContent()
      Returns the content or null.
      JNode JNode.getFirst(String query)
      Searches only child nodes (not all descendants) and retrieves the first JNode that matches the specified query; throws a NotFound Exception if no matching JNode is found, or if this method is invoked on a leaf node.
      JNode JNode.getParent()
      Returns the parent node or null if no parent node exists (such as for the root Node).
      JNode UserAgent.openJSON(File file)
      Parses the JSON within the specified File, and creates UserAgent.json to represent the root node of the JSON object (which is also returned by this method).
      JNode UserAgent.openJSON(String json)
      Parses the specified JSON and creates UserAgent.json to represent the root node of the JSON object (which is also returned by this method).
      Methods in com.jaunt that return types with arguments of type JNode 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Iterator<JNode> JNodes.iterator()
      Returns an Iterator over the JNodes contained within this JNodes container.
      Iterator<JNode> JNode.iterator()
      If this JNode is of TYPE_OBJECT, returns returns an iterator over the child JNodes; otherwise returns null.
      List<JNode> JNodes.toList()
      Returns the child JNodes as a List.
